alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Western Chesterfield (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:56PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Chesterfield, northeastern Dinwiddie and southeastern Amelia Counties and the City of Colonial Heights through 1145 PM EDT... At 1056 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mannboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sutherland around 1115 PM EDT. Virginia State University, Ettrick and Matoaca around 1130 PM EDT. Colonial Heights around 1135 PM EDT. Petersburg around 1140 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beach, Winterpock, Centralia, Addison, Ammon and Chesterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Western Chesterfield
